text: di main palava wey loureno dey face since beginning of election na whether im go dey act as servant for dos santos as dat oen dey hold power tight since 38 yearstori be say dos santos don pack di security forces with people wey dey loyal to am and im go dey in control of di ruling party mpla until at least 2022but di day after im win election loureno say im no go be boyboy for dos santos i go get all di power dis country no go get two presidents na wetin im talksabi people say dem no think say loureno go dey free like dat di question na if e go dey able to create some breathing space or not na wetin didier peclard from di university of geneva tell afpothers feel say angola no go need to wait too long to know who really bi di president e go keep isabel as head of sonangol if e do am then dat na proof say dos santos still dey run angola na how benjamin auge from di french institute of international relations see di matter
label: The main issue which Lourenco faced since the beginning of the election has been the dilemma of having to serve as servant for Dos Santos, as the latter has held tight to power since 38 years.  Reports say Dos Santos has filled the security forces with people loyal to hiim and he is in control of the ruling party, MPLA, until as late as 2022.  But after he won the election, Lourenco said he would not be an underling for Dos Santos.  He retorted, "I will assume all the power.  This country will not have two presidents."  Experts have said they do not think that Lourenco can have so much freedom.  "The question is if he would be able to create some breathing space or not," said Didier Peclard from the University of Geneva to AFP.  Others feel that Angola will not need to wait for too long to know who is the de-facto president.  "Will he keep Isabel as head of Sonangol?  If he does so, that will be proof that Dos Santos is still running Angola," was the view of Benjamin Auge from the French Institute of International Relations.

text: di titan na a fiveperson submersible wey dey descend to depths of 4000 metresim dimensions na 670 cm x 280 cm x 250 cme get life support of 96 hours for a crew of fivee dey travel at three knots  wey be around 35 miles per hourasides from taking divers to di remains of di titanic dem dey use am for site survey and inspection research and data collection film and media production and deep sea testing of hardware and softwaree dey equipped with integrated platform wey di submarine dey launch from and dey return to before and afta each dive
label: The Titan is a five-person submersible which can descend to depths of 4,000 metres.  Its dimensions are 670 cm x 280 cm x 250 cm.  It has "life support" of 96 hours for a crew of five.  It travels at three knots - about 3.5 miles - per hour.  Asides from taking divers to the remains of the Titanic, it is used for site survey and inspection, research and data collection, film and media production, as well as deep sea testing of hardware and software.  It is equipped with an integrated platform from which the submarine launches and to which it returns before and after each dive.

text: wash di penis wit warm water every day wen you dey shower or bathif you get foreskin pull am softlysoftly and wash di under wellwellif you no wash di under di foreskin well one liquid substance wey dem dey call smegma fit begin gather diasmegma na one natural lubricant wey dey keep di penis moist na for di head of di penis e dey and under di foreskinif smegma build up for di foreskin e go start to dey smell and e go stop you from easily pulling your foreskin back and e go become breeding ground for bacteriadis fit cause redness and swelling of di head of your penis dis condition dem dey call am balanitisand e you get baby for house sabi pipo say make you no try pull back di foreskin of baby or young boy wit force as dis fit dem painful and cause am harmdi reason why dem tok so na because dia foreskin fit still dey attached to di head of di penis and neva retract fullyat dis stage of dia development no need to clean inside di foreskin
label: Wash the penis with warm water every day when you shower or bath.  If you have foreskin, pull it gently and wash the underneath thoroughly.  If you do not wash under the foreskin well, some liquid substance called smegma can start to gather there.  Smegma is a natural lubricant which keeps the penis moist.  It is available on the head of the penis and under the foreskin.  If smegma builds up on the foreskin, it will start to smell and it will stop you from pulling your foreskin back thus becoming a breeding ground for bacteria.  This can cause redness and swelling of the head of your penis; this condition is called balanitis.  If you have a baby in the house, experts say you should not try to pull back the foreskin of a baby or young boy with force as it can be painful and cause him harm.  The reason for that advice is the foreskin could still be attached to the head of the penis and yet to be fully retracted.  At that stage of their development, it is not necessary to clean inside the foreskin.

They are on the same page with the Federal government to fight terorists and bandits to the end. Ban open grazing and ensure security agents implement the ban.  The acting Inspector of General of Police should stop sending IGP monitoring units to the states but should allow the Commissioners of Police and state and zonal commands to handle their cases.  The meeting ageed that military policing in the South East should be well funded and should become effective.  They agreed that political leadership in the South East should bring together all the arsenals at their command as one united zone to fiight and flush out criminals and terroists from the zone. text: di tortoise wey dem dey popularly call alagba wey mean elder get im own boyboy for soun palace inside ogbomoso and dem no dey less than two per timena di papa of di current king find di tortoise for inside forest and come carri am enta palacee dey chop human being food like amala rice beans with plantain and fruits like pineapple pawpaw and bananaanimal sabi pipo den tok say di ogbomoso tortoise live pass di age wey im mates for totoise dey livedoctors neva visit alagba and dem neva chook am injection before according to di palacedi tortoise dey chop only two times per month and no dey near gate except she dey find waterm dat na how im boyboy dey sabi wetin she needpipo dey pray give i tortoise per time and dem tok say dem don recieve answers
label: The tortoise, popularly called Alagba, meaning elder, has not less than two personal servants at a time at the Soun palace in Ogbomoso.  The tortoise was found inside forest and brought to the palace by the father of the current king.  It eats human foods like amala, rice, beans with plantain and fruits like pineapple, pawpaw and banana.  Animal experts say the Ogbomoso tortoise has outlived the usual age for tortoise of the same specie.  Alagba has never been visited by doctors nor has it ever received an injection, according to the palace.  The tortoise eats only twice per month and does not come near the gate unless in attempt to find water; that is how its servants know what it needs.  People pray to the tortoise and claim they do receive answers to their prayers.

US President Joe Biden had condemned the attack and vowed to hold Russia accountable. Leaders from the UK, European Union, UN and NATO have also strongly condemned the Russian offensive. One German government spokesman say Chancellor Olaf Scholz has spoken to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and assure am of solidarity. UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson said he was "appalled" by the "unprovoked attack" and Britain would "respond decisively".European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen, has condemned Vladimir Putin for "bringing war back to Europe". Italian Prime Minister Mario Draghi says the action is "unjustified and unjustifiable". Meanwhile, Polish government spokesman Piotr Muller says it's "time to reinforce Nato eastern flank", he added that: "We expect that they will take such decisions".

Rivers State COVID-19 Local Governments Task Force will identify hotels still operating in spite of the lockdown and  the state gvernment will demolish such hotels.  Hotels with existing guests must send their guest lists to the Governor's office for verification and apprval.  This is all to protect the state from coronavirus.

text: all major russian banks go get dia assets frozen and dem go dey excluded from di uk financial system dis go stop russia from accessing sterling and clearing payments through di uk dis include a full and immediate freeze of vtb banklegislation go stop major russian companies and di state from raising finance or borrowing money on uk marketsdi asset dem go freeze go target 100 new individuals or entitiesaeroflot go dey banned from landing for ukdem go suspend dualuse export licences to cover components wey fit dey used for military purposeswithin days di uk go stop to export hightech items and oil refinery equipmentlimit go dey on di amount russians fit deposit for uk bank accountsdi pm say potential dey to cut russia comot from di swift international payment system and nothing dey off di tablesimilar financial sanctions go dey extended to belarus for dia role in di assault on ukrainedi uk go bring forward parts of di economic crime bill before di easter recess
label: All major Russia Banks will have their assets frozen and they will be excluded from the UK financial system.  This will stop Russia from accessing sterling and clearing payments through the UK.  This includes a full and immediate freeze of VTB bank.  Legislation wil stop major Russian companies and the state from raising finance or borrowing money on UK markets.  The assests to be frozen will target 100 new indiviuals or entities.  Aeroflot will be banned from landing in the UK.  UK will suspend dual-use export licences to cover components they can use for military purposes.  Wiithin days, the UK will stop to export high-tech items and oil refinery equipment.  There will be a limit on the amount Russians can deposit in UK bank accounts.  The PM said there is a possibility that Russia will be cut from the Swift international payment system and "nothing is off the table".  Similar financial sanctions will be extended to Belarus for its role in the assault on Ukraine.  The UK will bring forward parts of the Economic Crime Bill before the Easter recess.

label: Buhari speaks to Nigerians oversea, as he attends the EU-Africa Summit which is the meeting of leaders from Europe and Africa. He promise to reduce the number of Nigerians that tries to enter Europe illegally through the Sahara Desert and the Mediterranean Sea by giving them education, healthcare, and food to feed on at home.
